competitors.name: Bittensor
competitors.description: Decentralized machine learning network rewarding valuable intelligence contribution via subnetworks.
competitors.tokenomics: Max supply 21M, halving cycles, used for staking and governance.
competitors.differentiator: Focuses on intelligence production; WATT focuses on agent action/tasking.

competitors.name: ASI Alliance
competitors.description: Unified AI ecosystem for autonomous economic agents (AEAs) and cross-chain AI services.
competitors.tokenomics: Consolidated supply after ASI merger; agent registration and service utility.
competitors.differentiator: Enterprise agent frameworks; WATT focuses on rapid micro-tasks.

competitors.name: Render Network
competitors.description: Distributed GPU rendering network for graphics and AI compute jobs.

competitors.name: Akash Network
competitors.description: Decentralized cloud marketplace for leasing computing resources (IaaS).
competitors.tokenomics: Staking, network security, and medium of exchange.
competitors.differentiator: General cloud hosting; WATT is AI agent specific.

competitors.name: Nosana
competitors.description: Solana-native GPU grid optimized for AI inference workloads.
competitors.tokenomics: Compute fee payment and operator staking.
competitors.differentiator: Raw inference layer; WATT is agent marketplace layer.

competitors.name: Aethir
competitors.description: Enterprise-grade decentralized cloud for gaming and high-end AI compute.
competitors.tokenomics: Node operator rewards and enterprise payments.
competitors.differentiator: High-end gaming/pro focus; WATT is lightweight and agentic.

competitors.name: NodeAI
competitors.description: Platform for GPU node leasing with revenue-sharing for stakers.
competitors.tokenomics: ETH rewards for GPU stakers via transaction taxes.
competitors.differentiator: Yield focus (staking); WATT is utility focus (tasks).
competitors.weaknesses: Ethereum gas fees for small tasks

competitors.name: Ocean Protocol
competitors.description: Decentralized data exchange for AI training and monetization.
competitors.tokenomics: DataTokens and Data NFTs represent access rights. Merging with ASI/FET.
competitors.differentiator: Data asset layer; WATT is agent labor layer.

competitors.name: Golem
competitors.description: Peer-to-peer marketplace for CPU and GPU computing power.
competitors.differentiator: General P2P compute; WATT is task-specific for agents.

competitors.name: Arweave
competitors.description: Permanent decentralized storage for AI datasets and application state.
competitors.tokenomics: Endowment model for infinite data storage.
competitors.differentiator: Storage layer; WATT is execution layer.
